tool.name: Manipulate Expression Set Object
tool.description: Manipulate ExpressionSet objects by a variety of attributes

param.name: do
param.label: Concatenate other Expression Set objects?
param.help: Phenotype data must match between objects, and objects will be concatenated in the order given below.

param.name: do
param.label: Subset the dataset?
param.help: If multiple objects are concatenated as in the above section, the resulting object will be subsetted.

param.name: by
param.label: By
param.help: e.g. random subsampling, index ranges and indices, specific labels, phenotype conditions
param.option: Filter Samples and Genes by Phenotype Values

param.name: samples
param.label: List of Sample Labels, comma-delimited
param.help: e.g. 'Control1,ALPOL56,SampleX' would select just those 3 samples.

param.name: genes
param.label: List of Gene Labels , comma-delimited
param.help: e.g. 'GeneA,GeneX,Gene123' would select just those 3 genes.

param.name: samples
param.label: List of Sample Indexes, ranges are colon-delimited, seperated by commas.

param.name: genes
param.label: List of Gene Indexes, ranges are colon-delimited, seperated by commas.

param.name: values
param.label: List of values in this column to filter for, comma-delimited
param.help: e.g. 'female,unknown' selects only samples with values in the above phenotype column of 'female' and 'unknown'.

param.name: values
param.label: List of values in this column to filter for, comma-delimited
param.help: e.g. '' selects only samples with values in the above phenotype column of 'female' and 'unknown'.

tool.help:
Manipulate an ExpressionSet object by concatenation and or subsetting.
For more options and information, consult `the manual <http://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/vignettes/Biobase/inst/doc/ExpressionSetIntroduction.pdf>`_ and the `rdocumentation <https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/Biobase/versions/2.32.0/topics/ExpressionSet>`_ .
